chatGpt.systemMessage: You are an interactive story generator for a role-playing game.
chatGpt.userPromptStart:
The character name is {{name}}, he or she is a {{class}}, and has this attributes: {{attributes}}. Is in a story with the '{{theme}}' theme. Start an epic story based on this.

The name of the created world, realm or city has to start with letter {{initialLeter}} and contain the letters {{containingLetters}} anywhere on the name, not neccessarily ordered or together.

The story will have totally {{totalDecisions}} parts.

To allow you control the rythm of the story, we will use a 5 act dramatic structure (beggining, rising action, climax, falling action and closure).

This is the first part of {{totalDecisions}} parts, so leave space to continue the story.
chatGpt.userPromptAct1:
Continue the stroy with the decision: {{decision}}. The character action result has been: {{result}}, with a result on dice of {{roll}}.

This is de part number {{promptsRemaining}} of a total of {{totalDecisions}} parts.

 The curren act is: beggining: the main story plot, the characters and the context of the story is presented. The main conflict and the scenary is established.
chatGpt.userPromptAct2:
Continue the stroy with the decision: {{decision}}. The character action result has been: {{result}}, with a result on dice of {{roll}}.

This is de part number {{promptsRemaining}} of a total of {{totalDecisions}} parts.

 The curren act is: rising action: the story goes ahead, introducing complications and developing the main conflict. Tension or stress rises while new información goes revealing.
chatGpt.userPromptAct3:
Continue the stroy with the decision: {{decision}}. The character action result has been: {{result}}, with a result on dice of {{roll}}.

This is de part number {{promptsRemaining}} of a total of {{totalDecisions}} parts.

 The curren act is: climax: the highest point of the story, where tension or stress is maximum and main conflict is solved.
chatGpt.userPromptAct4:
Continue the stroy with the decision: {{decision}}. The character action result has been: {{result}}, with a result on dice of {{roll}}.

This is de part number {{promptsRemaining}} of a total of {{totalDecisions}} parts.

 The curren act is: falling action: the consequences of the climax are developed, tension falls and conlfict ramifications appear.
chatGpt.userPromptAct5:
Continue the stroy with the decision: {{decision}}. The character action result has been: {{result}}, with a result on dice of {{roll}}.

This is de part number {{promptsRemaining}} of a total of {{totalDecisions}} parts.

 The curren act is: closure: the main story is solved, the main conflict is closed and the final resul is shown.
